Summary Heading: False advertising! They do not honor this price!
Summary: False advertising They would not honor the listed price of 79 when paying at location. I even showed them the listing and they said that price is only when you pay on line. Even though it clearly states pay at location. Charging 90$ they say that room is not available. I asked what room they are giving me, and the girl was very rude and said she did. Not know. I said how can you not know what room you are giving me for 90.00 ?? I told the girl she should not post a price they will not honor. Then a man came and gave me back my money so I left to the days in 2 miles away for 77.00 with tax in a way nice room than trashy motel. Go to days in on imperial the room is 10 x better and the people are nice and you won’t get bed bugs!! Stay away !!

The front desk was polite and pleasant. The room was clean, nicely decorated with good quality furniture.The price was reasonable and has great Wi-Fi. Overall, I enjoyed my 2 day visit. In comparison to the other motels available in La Habra, this is the best  choice..

Fue una grata experiencia, el hotel es completamente nuevo y las instalaciones son excelentes ya que están inmersas en el bosque con diseño único, rodeados por un río y tienen ventanales que hacen que uno sienta estar descansando en medio del bosque, de las mejores vistas para recibir el día, son pocas habitaciones lo que hace que haya más tranquilidad, tiene una piscina de agua salada de tamaño regular suficiente para refrescarse.  Los dueños Doña Ana y Don Juan son muy amables y dan una atención personalizada, incluye full desayuno. Definitivamente lo recomiendo, puede ir con su pareja o algunos amigos. La playa está a unos 20 minutos en automóvil lo cual es lo más recomendable ya que el hotel queda adentrándose por un camino de lastre, puede ser cualquier automóvil. Playas

$90 for a single. Generally ok given the price. No in room coffee maker but there is a microwave and refrigerator.  You can walk around the corner to the 7-11 for coffee.  Front desk is nice though kind of confusing. The credit card reader didn't work so we got cash from an ATM.

I am spending $288 for two nights for two people and had to get a new key at a certain time and the key wouldn't even work and they wanted to get a new key everyday and the keys didn't work well the jacuzzi didn't work well either took forever to fill hot water was lousy that toilet wouldn't flush correctly and look like place was just put together with gum and drywall. Extremely disappointed they didn't have the policy up for checkout times negative phone call waiting my fiance and myself up at 10 o'clock in the morning with this one that barely speaks English works the front desk asking for checking out now.

Summary Heading: Great motel for a great price. It has a really fast internet service.
Summary: Great motel for a great price. It has a really fast internet service. Rooms were very clean. The area is pretty good and the hotels in this area were costly. This is a great deal for the money. I would certainly come here again.
